room_0.message: Hello, this is the middle room. Above is room one, to the left is room two, to the right, room three, and below is room four.

room_1.message: Hello, this is room one. Below is the middle room.

room_2.message: Hello, this is room two. To the right is the middle room.

room_3.message: Hello, this is room three. To the left is the middle room.

room_4.message: Hello, this is room four. Above is the middle room.

responses.1: Why do you want to hurt me so?
responses.4: Clearly, you don't understand how this works.
responses.5: What are you looking for, easter eggs?
responses.7: This does not even deserve a Captain's Log introduction.
